text: Satya Mithya is a 1989 Bangladeshi film directed by A. J. Mintu. It won five Bangladesh National Film Awards in the Best Producer, Best Screenplay, Best Dialogue, Best Editing and Best Child Artist categories. ==Cast== * Shabana as Rabeya * Alamgir as Raju Ahmed * Anwar Hossain as Gofur * Wasimul Bari Rajib as Amjad * Golam Mustafa as Mr. Chowdhury * Nuton as Rita Chowdhry ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Bangladeshi films Category:1980s Bengali-language films
title: Satya Mithya
